storage.tip1: • Ensure grains are properly dried before storage (moisture content below 12-14%)
storage.tip2: • Use clean, pest-free storage bags or containers
storage.tip3: • Store in well-ventilated areas away from moisture
storage.tip4: • Regular inspection for pest infestation is essential
storage.tip5: • Keep proper records of stored quantities and dates
storage.tip6: • Consider temperature-controlled storage for high-value crops
